Andy Coulson , the former editor of the News of the World, stood down after a series of new revelations about illegal phone-hacking during his time at the tabloid. The Prime Minister's spokesman said: He had finished what he wanted to finish and good progress is being made with his replacement.`` It was his choice to leave quietly but he said a proper goodbye to the prime minister and those he worked closely with. Andy Coulson resigned as editor of the News of the World in 2007 when its royal editor, Clive Goodman , was jailed for conspiracy to access phone messages. With Theo Ratliff on the injured list and Matt Geiger suspended, Allen Iverson outplayed Kobe Bryant and the 76ers used a platoon of reserve centers to deal with Shaquille O'Neal en route to an impressive 112-97 victory over the Los Angeles Lakers. We knew we were outmatched. We didn't have two of our Shaquille O'Neal men, but we just knew we had to come out and play some ball, Allen Iverson said after scoring 40 points and handing out nine assists in 40 minutes.
